text: Wonder Boys is a 2000 American British German Japanese comedy-drama movie directed by Curtis Hanson and is based on the 1995 novel of the same name by Michael Chabon. It stars Michael Douglas, Tobey Maguire, Frances McDormand, Robert Downey Jr., Katie Holmes, Rip Torn, Richard Knox, Jane Adams, Michael Cavadias, Richard Thomas, Alan Tudyk and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. The movie won 1 Oscar and was nominated for two Academy Awards in 2001. It also won 1 and was nominated for three Golden Globes in 2001. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:2000 comedy-drama movies Category:2000 LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese LGBT movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Curtis Hanson Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies set in Pittsburgh Category:Movies about educators
title: Wonder Boys (movie)
